column3: These should be submitted to the [bitcoin-core leveldb repo](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/leveldb).\n
Right, we can not merge this, as it would "overwrite" the subtree. Please submit upstream: https://github.com/google/leveldb\n
I'm a little confused though as it does seem that these files are in bitcoin also.. should they be in both projects? how are they kept in sync?\n
@sipa I'm still seeing these errors when compiling bitcoin, even though I've PRed the leveldb... how do I stop the old versions of these files from being put in the directory structure please?\n
It's just a copy of the tree. If you want the same changes to show up to\ntest with, just make the sake changes in the subtree.\n
